name: Gran Trak (TheClockworks)
description:
A clone of the original Gran Trak 10 made to help familiarize myself with Construct 3. The goal is to complete as many laps as possible in the allotted time. Completing laps fast enough will grant additional time.

Controls:

Up arrow - Forward

Down arrow - Reverse

Left arrow - Turn left

Right arrow - Turn right

Shift - Jump
